pageContext.claim: “[Trump is told that his statement that Nevada won’t be checking signatures on mail ballots was untrue.] Okay, but that's not what they said when they approved it. They said they're not going to check signatures. They're not going to be able to. And their machinery, which is old, doesn't allow them to. It's going to be physically impossible for them to do that, especially in a short period of time.”
pageContext.analysis: False. Nevada has never wavered from its policy of verifying signatures on mail ballots.
